CustomField.description:
The Bindable Name is used to refer the Named Query in other Named Queries or Tracked Objects. In the following example, the "accountIdsOfUser" string is the bindable name of a named query.
SELECT * From Account WHERE Id IN ::accountIdsOfUser::
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Bindable Name is used to refer the Named Query in other Named Queries or Tracked Objects.
CustomField.label: Bindable Name
